title: SPA pH-
long_description: SPA pH – is a pH reducer. Its concentrated liquid formula is specifically designed for spas. The odourless liquid dissolves quickly in hot water for rapid results, with no residue to affect bather comfort.
short_description: BENEFITS Fast-acting concentrated liquid formula Improves bather comfort FORMAT 1 L

characteristics.title: Recommended levels
characteristics.text: Maintain recommended daily levels as determined by testing kit: pH: 7.2 – 7.8 Total alkalinity: 100 – 150 ppm

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Pour SPA pH – directly over the surface of the spa water.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Add SPA pH – according to the application method and recommended dosage. Wait 15 minutes and retest pH. Repeat treatment until recommended levels are reached. Wait 10 minutes before bathing.

dosage.specifications: When pH level is above 7.8: Add 60 mL of SPA pH – per 1,000 L of spa water to lower pH by approximately 0.4.

warning: Spa must be running before adding SPA pH -. DO NOT apply the product when people are in the spa.
